home.title: Whatâ€™s your idea for GOAT App?
home.description: Describe your idea. The community will vote on the best ones.
home.card1.title: Be Specific
home.card1.text: Clearly define what your feature does and how it works.
home.card2.title: Explain the 'Why'
home.card2.text: Describe the problem your idea solves or the value it adds.
home.card3.title: Keep it Actionable
home.card3.text: Suggest a clear, implementable solution for the team.
home.inputPlaceholder: e.g., Add a dark mode feature for the app...

ideas.empty.title: No proposals found.
ideas.empty.description: Try adjusting your search or filter.
ideas.error.fetchFailed: Failed to load proposals. Please try again.

vote.title: Big Issue Vote
vote.description: Cast your vote and see the results in real-time.
vote.question: Should we build Auth feature?
vote.subQuestion: Help us decide on the next big feature for our platform. Your input is valuable!
